00017 void Maze::AddRoom(class Room * room) {
00018     this->Rooms->PutAt(room->GetRoomNo(),room);
00019 }

00021 class Room * Maze::RoomNo(int roomNo) const {
00022     class Room *aRoom;
00023     aRoom = (class Room *) this->Rooms->GetAt(roomNo); 
00024     return aRoom;
00025 }
